about.title: About
about.description: In my graduation project, I developed a MERN stack website with React, Vue.js, Redux and Node.js; I provided data management with RESTful API and MongoDB. I am currently developing a project with API integration, SSR, advanced search and filtering features using Next.js and a real-time chat application with MERN stack. In machine learning and deep learning, I worked on CNN and YOLO based image classification projects with TensorFlow, Keras, PyTorch.
